fields.summary: Windows: Mocha test Titanium.XML xmlNodeListRange test failure

comments.body:
Error from here https://github.com/ewanharris/titanium-mobile-mocha-suite/blob/4b75b3f057ad8771bc0d0f2ebf249096462a9207/Resources/ti.xml.test.js#L1030

"error":{"name":"AssertionError","actual":false,"expected":true,"operator":"to equal","message":"expected false to equal true","generatedMessage":true,"stack":"/should.js:1411:20
/your-test.js:63:48
run@/ti-mocha.js:4363:19
runTest@/ti-mocha.js:4768:13
/ti-mocha.js:4846:19
next@/ti-mocha.js:4693:16
/ti-mocha.js:4703:11
next@/ti-mocha.js:4641:25
/ti-mocha.js:4670:9
timeslice@/ti-mocha.js:5777:27","showDiff":true}
Per spec should return null instead of undefined when nothings exists at the index given to #item https://www.w3.org/TR/DOM-Level-2-Core/core.html#ID-844377136
